name: Turtles all the way down
body:
### Welcome

It's never too late. Basic needs can be met. Trust can be rebuilt. It takes is intention. To make it a priority, to build a stronger foundation, to take care of the people who are meaningful to us. Dream it; do it. There is no other. There are no shortcuts. Life is difficult. Embrace the challenges, and overcome them, or give up — and retire to Florida. There is no middle ground.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
